name: Space Train
description:
Space Train is a detective game. Listen to people and find informations quickly!

"20XX, a multinational company controls the civilized world. Abroad the S.S.Altenburger the resistance is fighting for the freedom of mankind."

Features :

  • Visual Novel & Deductive gameplay
  • English and French translation
  • ~10min to complete

Credits :

  • Programming : Yvan Corsiglia (from Nice Penguins) (https://twitter.com/Striwx)
  • Scenario : William Bertin (from GameSideStory) (https://twitter.com/Skywilly_GSS)
  • Graphism : Tanguy Duhil de Bénazé (https://www.instagram.com/jt_ddb/)

--

Made for GGJ18 "Transmission" this is the post-jam version.

Jam version : https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/space-train-le-train-de-lespace
